mapper.select: SELECT t.user_id AS user_id, t.username AS username, t.cost_id AS cost_id, c.description AS description, nvl(c.cost, 0) AS cost FROM pms_sys_user t, pms_stak_cost c WHERE t.status = 1 AND t.USER_ID = #{id} AND t.COST_ID = c.cost_id (+)
mapper.insert:
SELECT PMS_PROJECT_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PMS_PROJECT_INFO (PROJ_ID, TEMP_ID, PROJ_NAME, PROJ_TYPE, BELO_PROJ_GROUP, PROJ_LEVEL, CONS_MODE, UNDERTAKE_MODE, IS_COMPLET_IN_A_YEAR, START_DATE, END_DATE, STATE, CREATOR, YEAR) VALUES (#{projId}, #{tempId}, #{projName}, #{projType}, #{beloProjGroup}, #{projLevel}, #{consMode}, #{undertakeMode}, #{isCompletYear}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{state}, #{creator},#{year} )

SELECT PMS_PROJ_STEP_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PMS_PROJ_STEP (STEP_ID, PROJ_ID, STEP_MOD, DEFAULT_DATE, STATE) VALUES (#{stepId}, #{projId}, #{stepMod}, #{defaultDate}, #{state} )

SELECT PMS_PROJ_STAKEHOLDER_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PMS_PROJ_STAKEHOLDER (PROJ_STAKEHOLDER_ID, PROJ_ID, PROJ_GROUP_MANAGER, BIG_PROJ_MANAGER, PROJ_MANAGER, DEMA_MANAGER, TECH_MANAGER, PROJ_MEMBERS) VALUES (#{projStakeholderId}, #{projId}, #{projGroupManager}, #{bigProjManager}, #{projManager}, #{demaManager}, #{techManager}, #{projMembers} )

SELECT PMS_PROJ_COST_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PMS_PROJ_COST (PROJ_SCALE_ID, PROJ_ID, PERS_MONT_TOTAL, RESOURCE_COST, PERS_MONT_OUTSOURCE, OUTSOURCE_COST) VALUES (#{projScaleId}, #{projId}, #{persMountTotal}, #{resourceCost}, #{persMountOutsource}, #{outsourceCost})

SELECT PMS_PROJ_USER_WORKTIME_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PMS_PROJ_USER_WORKTIME (WORKTIME_ID, PROJ_ID, USER_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, USE_RATE) VALUES (#{worktimeId}, #{projId}, #{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{useRate} )
